title: Replace profile photo with LinkedIn image URL

requirements.summary: Replace the profile image src in HeroSection.tsx with the external LinkedIn URL
acceptanceCriteria: The profile photo in the Hero section displays the image from the provided LinkedIn URL.
No other images or elements on the page are affected.
Existing alt text, CSS classes, and error/fallback handling on the img element are preserved.
The change is limited to the img element at the specified XPath in HeroSection.tsx.

file_operations.description: Update the profile image src attribute to use the LinkedIn URL: https://media.licdn.com/dms/image/v2/D4D03AQG_vKIcM3o7oQ/profile-displayphoto-scale_400_400/B4DZw8fRO0HwAg-/0/1770541359476?e=1773878400&v=beta&t=hNLsHkQFnEh-Boegm1kbBhX7F8v1P42PUa-DT2DJzkk. Preserve all existing alt text, className, and any error/fallback handling logic on the img element. Do not modify any other part of the component.
